# CTMISD

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The CTMISD package may be used to nonparametrically estimate self-exciting point processes. This package allows for the implementation of the Continuous Triggering Model Independent Stochastic Declustering (CTMISD) algorithm, a modification of the MISD algorithm. 

## Installation 

You can install the development version of CTMISD like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("boydpe/CTMISD")
```
